about.title: Who am I?
about.description: I am a results-driven Software Developer & Headless CMS Specialist with over six years of experience in frontend development, CMS architecture, and cloud computing. Recognized as a Subject Matter Expert (SME) in Headless CMS, I have deep expertise in Contentstack and Adobe Experience Manager (AEM), leading projects focused on composable architecture, multi-site deployments, API integrations, and performance optimization. Passionate about building high-performance, scalable web applications, I thrive in leading technical initiatives that drive business growth. Currently, I am seeking international opportunities to leverage my skills in a global environment, collaborating with forward-thinking teams to create innovative digital experiences.
